root.name: Huge Insect
root.description: The game was listed in Sachen's catalog of games, but was not actually ever produced until 2001. It was produced because video game journalist Frank Cifaldi, as well as other collectors, kept emailing Sachen asking for a copy of the game. Sachen eventually made Huge Insect as a bug shooter for the NES, making it one of the rarest NES games of all time. One month after publishing the game they went out of business.
